input_text:
Job Title: Project Manager

Location: San Antonio, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Information Technology, Project Management

Description:
eMetric is currently seeking a talented Project Manager to join our San Antonio, TX team. The Project Manager will be responsible for managing and leading one or more high-profile projects while effectively managing relationships among team members and with clients. The ideal candidate will be highly organized, detail-oriented and a great communicator.   Primary Responsibilities  Manage project initiation and customer onboarding   Document and manage project scope   Define and prioritize project tasks   Establish project goals, requirements, and desired results   Create, manage, and update project schedules  Define, manage, and update resources   Identify and manage project issues and risks   Facilitate team meetings to discuss and review the work   Ensure the quality provided and delivered meets that in the agreed plan   Ensure that the team follows all formal and informal best practices in project management and other initiatives   Establish and maintain customer relationships appropriately   Manage customer expectations in delivery     Qualifications: Education and Experience:   Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent work experience required   Master’s degree or related technical and management training preferred   3+ years previous project management experience preferred  Experience working with education systems and data is a plus   Skills, Knowledge and Abilities:   Knowledge of software development life cycle (SDLC) processes and software development methodologies (Agile)    Knowledge of project management methodologies and tools    Strong analytical and logical thinking ability   Effective problem-solving skills   Excellent oral and written communication skills   Negotiation and conflict resolution skills   Strong presentation skills  Ability to deal with change   Background check required  Team member is required to be in-office as needed. Candidate should be local to the San Antonio area.   We take pride in our products and know they have an enormous impact on thousands of students every day. Our employees are our greatest asset! In addition to an excellent work environment, all employees receive medical and dental insurance, long and short term disability insurance, paid vacation and holidays, flexible hours, retirement plan eligibility, fitness club membership reimbursement, and a casual work environment.

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Project Manager
output_json.summary: eMetric is seeking a Project Manager for their San Antonio, TX team.
preferred_degrees: Master’s degree or related technical and management training
job_responsibilities: Manage project initiation and customer onboarding
Establish project goals, requirements, and desired results
Create, manage, and update project schedules
Identify and manage project issues and risks
Facilitate team meetings to discuss and review the work
Ensure the quality provided and delivered meets that in the agreed plan
Ensure that the team follows all formal and informal best practices in project management and other initiatives
Establish and maintain customer relationships appropriately
benefits: Long and short term disability insurance

other.content:
Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent work experience required
Master’s degree or related technical and management training preferred
3+ years previous project management experience preferred
Experience working with education systems and data is a plus

Knowledge of software development life cycle (SDLC) processes and software development methodologies (Agile)
Knowledge of project management methodologies and tools
Strong analytical and logical thinking ability
Effective problem-solving skills
Excellent oral and written communication skills
Negotiation and conflict resolution skills
Strong presentation skills
Ability to deal with change
